name: kagi-search
title: Kagi Search
description: Searches the Closed Beta of Kagi Search, with autosuggestions and quick access to FastGPT
author: fearoffish

preferences.name: token
preferences.title: Kagi Session Link
preferences.description: Please enter your Kagi session link, which can be found at https://kagi.com/settings?p=user_details in your Session Link

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Kagi API Key
preferences.description: Your Kagi API key from https://kagi.com/settings?p=api. Required for search results and FastGPT.

preferences.label: Use API for Search
preferences.name: useApiForSearch
preferences.title: Use API for Search
preferences.description: Should Kagi results be displayed in Raycast? If no, responses will be opened in browser

preferences.label: Enable FastGPT Shortcut
preferences.name: fastGptShortcut
preferences.title: Enable FastGPT Shortcut
preferences.description: Enables in-Raycast answers from FastGPT by ending query with '?'

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
